europeana:record.dc:title: On the biological cycle of the gall wasp Plagiotrochus suberi Weld 1926 (Hymenoptera: Cynipoidea: Cynipidae) in the circum-Mediterranean region
Contributions to Zoology
europeana:record.dc:creator: Pujade-Villar J.
Garbin L.
Paretas-Martínez J.
Díaz N.B.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Plagiotrochus suberi Weld 1926
hymenoptera
cynipidae
europeana:record.dc:description: Oak gall wasps (Cynipidae: Cynipini: Plagiotrochus) that induce galls on Quercus reproduce by alternate sexual and parthenogenetic generations (Pujade-Villar et al., 2001). However, a few species are obligatory parthenogenetic (Abe, 1998) or show the facultative alternation of generations (Folliot, 1964).
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: On the biological cycle of the gall wasp Plagiotrochus suberi Weld 1926 (Hymenoptera: Cynipoidea: Cynipidae) in the circum-Mediterranean region (URN:ISSN:1383-4517) (Volume 77) (Issue 4)
